import React from 'react' import {Link } from "react-router-dom" import {formatPrice} from "../../utils/helpers"; const Product = ({product}) => { console.log(product); return ( <>
{product?.category}
Brand: {product?.brand}
{product?.title}
{formatPrice(product?.price)} {formatPrice(product?.discountedPrice)}
) } export default Product
